dict.string: CaptainSabino needs notification permission to remind you of important deadlines and maintenance schedules.
CaptainSabino needs speech recognition to allow you to add expenses by voice.
CaptainSabino needs microphone access to record your voice for expense input.
CaptainSabino needs camera access to scan receipt photos for quick expense entry.
CaptainSabino can save receipt photos to your library for your records.
